file_content.text: Greetings, Master Jedi. The Bounty Brokers Association welcomes you.
Greetings, soldier. The Bounty Brokers Association welcomes you.
Greetings, Captain. The Bounty Brokers Association welcomes you.
If you are interested in the exciting career of bounty hunting, you may review available contracts by using the terminal nearby.
Please note that Republic environmental regulations severely limit the amount of carbonite used to capture bounty targets in order to protect native planetary ecologies.
Fortunately, there are currently no ecological concerns surrounding blaster fire, stabbings, high explosive detonations, or corpses. Good hunting!
